title: Charge moves between plates velocity graphs

content.question: A positively charged particle is moving horizontally when it enters the uniform electric field between two parallel charged plates, as shown in the figure above. Which of the following correctly shows the x- and y-components of the velocity v as a function of time t ?

choices.label: The figure presents two line graphs in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled 0. The horizontal axis is labeled “t” for both graphs. The vertical axis for the graph on the left is labeled “v sub x,” and the vertical axis for the graph on the right is labeled “v sub y.” Both the graph on the left and the graph on the right are a horizontal line beginning on the vertical axis above the origin.
The figure presents two line graphs in the first and fourth quadrants of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled 0. The horizontal axis is labeled

The figure presents two line graphs in the first and fourth quadrants of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled 0. The horizontal axis is labeled -t^ for both graphs. The vertical axis for the graph on the left is labeled
The figure presents two line graphs in the first and fourth quadrants of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled 0. The horizontal axis is labeled

content.answer: The figure presents two line graphs in the first and fourth quadrants of a coordinate plane, with the origin labeled 0. The horizontal axis is labeled

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
